Posts.Content: Hi there, after reading your comments I googled and had a look at the article, totally agree with you, it's dreadful and I don't think it promotes the awareness of breast cancer at all, it promotes her , I have just been discharged after nine long years and for the first time feel that I can now get on with my life, I feel that the promoters could have chosen better!!
